title: Here's how Twitter reacted to the Gloved Hand Killer reveal in Hollyoaks - Hollyoaks Soaps -
text: Eight murders later and we finally have a culprit: Lindsey Butterfield has been revealed as Hollyoaks' Gloved Hand Killer.Of course, Digital Spy was keeping an eye out on Twitter to see what everyone thought about the big reveal. (Warning: Some of the tweets don't hold back on strong language.) © Lime Pictures Hollyoaks' Gloved Hand Killer speaks out: 'I couldn't ask for a better storyline'Hollyoaks boss Bryan Kirkwood reveals Gloved Hand Killer gossip after on-screen revealThere were people who just KNEW it was Lindsey:I KNEW IT WAS LINDSEY #Hollyoaks— SUNDAS (@sundasj14) October 21, 2015 I FUCKING KNEW IT. I EVEN WROTE IT DOWN ON A PIECE OF PAPER YESTERDAY. GOD I SHOULD BE A DETECTIVE #Hollyoaks #glovedhandkiller #revealed— ~liability~ (@ElsSendall) October 21, 2015 I knew Lindsey was the blue gloved killer #Hollyoaks #20yearsofhollyoaks— ♡sorry♡ (@umzftjdb) October 21, 2015 Why's everyone so surprised that it's Lynsey? Knew it was her #hollyoaks— kirsten (@kirstenstobiex) October 21, 2015However, some people were not happy:Hollyoaks need to improve their story line. Glove hand killer is that the best you can come up with?— jess (@JessieMcarevey) October 21, 2015 Pissed off at that hollyoaks episode— Hannah (@HannahhBarryx) October 21, 2015 Hollyoaks tonight is definitely going to piss me off, I can just feel it— tamwar (@itstamira) October 21, 2015 Absolutely hate Lindsey from Hollyoaks rn, not happy #freddy— Chelsey Rooney (@ChelseyRooney) October 21, 2015Everyone will miss Freddie:Who in their right mind thought it was okay to kill off Freddie?? #Hollyoaks— Nicole gorniak (@Nicole_Gorniak) October 21, 2015 Don't think I'm ever going to get over the fact that Freddie has been killed off on Hollyoaks, he was so beautiful— nats (@itsnaataalie_) October 21, 2015 @Hollyoaks I swear to god if Freddie is dead I will never watch this soap again,— Ayse.nigga (@AyseIsRandom) October 21, 2015 Blimey didn't see that coming!! Poor Freddie he even managed to pout at the end #Hollyoaks #freddie— carlie tullett (@cartull) October 21, 2015 Bloody hell #Hollyoaks #Hollyoaks20Years what you playing at killing Freddie @CharlieClapham off I'M TOTAL GUTTED— Anna BanannaBrown (@IwantBananna) October 21, 2015And some were offering suggestions for the next victim:Lindsey being the serial killer in hollyoaks is hilarious.. hope they drag it out abit so she can kill Maxine.. #Hollyoaks20Years— ♥ Dee Little ♥ (@DeeHLittle) October 21, 2015 if Lindsey could kill Diane next, that would be great #Hollyoaks— sabrina☺ (@12Sabrinaa) October 21, 2015 Now if Lindsey could just kill Nico too please. #Hollyoaks— Hollyoaks Fans (@Hollyoakslovers) October 21, 2015 Digital Spy Soap Scoop video - hit play below for gossip on EastEnders' Halloween special, Nikhil's Emmerdale return, the Nightingale family's arrival in Hollyoaks and a new romance story for Mary in Coronation Street. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID);
